articleContent:
During the event, boosted drop rates for 5-Star Resonator: Zhezhi, 4-Star Resonators: Chixia, Baizhi, and Sanhua!


✦Duration✦

1.2 update - 2024-09-07 09:59 (server time)


✦Eligibility✦

Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in First Resonance and activate Convene function.


✦Convene Rules✦

- [Chromatic Prose] is a Featured Resonator Convene event.

- Use Radiant Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or weapon every 10 attempts.

- The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Resonator Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Resonator is obtained.

- Featured Resonator Zhezhi is exclusive to the [Chromatic Prose] Featured Resonator Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.

- Featured Resonator Zhezhi's Waveband will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store with a limit of 2 purchases, and it will be removed once the Convene event ends.

- During the Convene, all Featured Resonators will be available in [Ascendant Aces] trial event. Complete the trial challenge with the Resonators to receive rewards.

※For more details, please refer to the Convene screen in-game.
articleTitle: [Chromatic Prose] Featured Resonator Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Zhezhi
